name: RetrieveCardList
description:
Retrieve a list of cards owned by the account.

The tool retrieves up to 25 cards associated with the account making the request. It should be used when there is a need to access card information for the account.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A string value representing a pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of results. Use this to continue from the last retrieved set.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

See [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination) for more information.

parameters.name: filter_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Limit results to cards associated with the specified customer. By default, all merchant-owned cards are returned.

value_schema.description:
Limit results to cards associated with the customer supplied.
By default, all cards owned by the merchant are returned.

parameters.name: filter_by_reference_id
parameters.description: Filter results to include only cards associated with the specified reference ID.

value_schema.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

parameters.name: card_sort_order
parameters.description: Defines the sort order for the card creation date. Use 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending. Defaults to 'ASC'.

value_schema.description:
Sorts the returned list by when the card was created with the specified order.
This field defaults to ASC.

parameters.name: include_disabled_cards
parameters.description: Set to true to include disabled cards in the results. By default, only enabled cards are returned.

value_schema.description:
Includes disabled cards.
By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

parameters.description:

parameters.description:

By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

value_schema.description:
Includes disabled cards.
By default, all enabled cards owned by the merchant are returned.

parameters.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

value_schema.description: Limit results to cards associated with the reference_id supplied.

parameters.description:
Sorts the returned list by when the card was created with the specified order.
This field defaults to ASC.

value_schema.description:
Sorts the returned list by when the card was created with the specified order.
This field defaults to ASC.
